page.title: 03Village Schools
page.content: The two village schools that are closing,are Old Alresford and Hinton Ampner at Bramdean.We are moving into Hinton Ampner School while ours is being rebuilt.We will have to have a temporary classroom put up as there wont be room for all of us there. When we move back to Cheriton, children from Kilmeston,Beauworth and Bramdean will be coming to us. Once there were schools in all these villages. Hinton Ampner had a farewell gathering at Bramdean Village Hall and one lady there was a pupil 72 years ago! Everyone had a commemorative mug with the school crest and dated 1733-1985. There are only 16 children left at Hinton and they spent a day with us, so they will feel at home when they come to us in September.
